comments.body:
According to the documentï¼Œ`encoding` has a default value `utf8` and withFileTypes has a default value `false`

So I think here should be `{ encoding?: string, withFileTypes?: boolean } `

Overloaded signatures were already provided to effectively support `{ encoding?: string, withFileTypes?: boolean }`.
https://github.com/DefinitelyTyped/DefinitelyTyped/blob/e8c7805c47489ed1b20821d9c22fae10be014e75/types/node/fs.d.ts#L821-L861
